title: Looking for players for a Diamond+ team and a Plat-Low Diamond team
body:
Hi everyone, we are looking for players to trial for two sister teams which will be playing under the same branch/name for OOL, tournaments, flex queue and Riot's new tournament system in season 8. Currently we are looking for the roles of:

MAIN TEAM:
**TOP:** Diamond 3-Challenger
**JG: **Unavailable/Taken
**MID: **Diamond 2-Challenger
**ADC:** Unavailable/Taken
**SUPPORT:** Diamond 3-Challenger

-If you are lower than the cut-off ranks but do play to those standards in a team environment, you can still be accepted.

SISTER TEAM/SECOND TEAM:
**TOP:** Plat 5+
**JG: **Plat 5+
**MID: **Plat 5+
**ADC:** Plat 5+
**SUPPORT:** Unavailable/Taken

-If you are lower than the cut-off ranks but do play to those standards in a team environment, you can still be accepted.


IF YOU'RE INTERESTED PLEASE ADD ME!
MY IGN IS: **Azus**

replies.body: Interested but your name is unavailable in the client.

INVITE ME PLEASE I AM DIAMOND 2
 MID LANE MAIN THAT CAN PLAY ANYONE
